description: Program to take a script with some special markup and turn it into both an RST page and a script for the online Sphinx documentation.

input_script.title: Input script
input_script.description: Input script file with special markup

prefix_rst.title: RST file prefix
prefix_rst.description: Output filename including any path of the RST/Sphinx file. Must include file extension '.rst'.

prefix_script.title: Script file prefix
prefix_script.description: Output filename of the script file. Should include file extension such as '.tcsh'.

reflink.title: Reference link
reflink.description: A string tag that will serve as the subdirectory name holding images for the given demo, and the RST internal reference label.

execute_script.title: Execute script flag
execute_script.description: Flag to create the RST and script files, and also execute the script.
